Package HwSystem.Devices.Sensors

Class IMUSensor

java.lang.Object
HwSystem.Devices.Device
HwSystem.Devices.Sensors.Sensor
HwSystem.Devices.Sensors.IMUSensor
Direct Known Subclasses:
GY951, MPU6050
public abstract class IMUSensor extends Sensor
Abstract class representing Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) sensors. Extends the Sensor class and provides specific functionality for IMU sensors. Concrete IMU sensor implementations must extend this class and implement the getAccel and getRot methods.
